properties.body:
HARDCOPY STANDARD NAUTICAL CHART ADVISORY FOR NGA
CHARTS IN NON-US WATERS.
1. EXERCISE CAUTION WHEN USING NGA PRODUCED STANDARD
   NAUTICAL CHARTS (SNC), AKA PAPER CHARTS, IN
   NON-US WATERS.
2. SINCE US NOTICE TO MARINERS 48/18, DATED 26 NOV 18,
   NGA HAS NOT APPLIED CURRENT FOREIGN NOTICE TO
   MARINERS TO SNCS DUE TO A PROCESS ERROR.  NGA
   IS REVIEWING FOREIGN NOTICE TO MARINERS RECEIVED
   FROM NOV 18 TO MAR 19 TO IDENTIFY ROCKS, WRECKS
   AND OBSTRUCTIONS FOR IMMEDIATE PROCESSING.
   THESE NOTICE TO MARINERS WILL BE PRIORITIZED,
   APPLIED, AND TRANSMITTED ON ANY ITEMS IDENTIFIED
   AS HAZARDS TO NAVIGATION.
3. DIGITAL NAUTICAL CHARTS (DNC) ARE UP TO DATE AND
   CURRENT FOR ALL NOTICE TO MARINERS WORLD-WIDE.
   ALL SNCS IN US WATERS ARE UP TO DATE WITH THE MOST
   CURRENT US COAST GUARD LOCAL NOTICE TO MARINERS.
4. RECEIPT OF ALL FOREIGN NOTICE TO MARINERS IS
   EXPECTED BY 01 APR 19, AND NGA WILL RESUME
   NORMAL PROCESSING.
